title: Jackson Cannon's Adriatique Recipe
full_text:
Jackson Cannon's Adriatique Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
ounce
freshly squeezed
orange juice
1
ounce
Amaro Montenegro
1/2
ounce
Aperol
Directions
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice, add orange juice, amaro, and Aperol. Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Special Equipment
Cocktail shaker and strainer
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
